Player History

Drafted in 6th round, 155th overall pick, by San Diego in 2010...
Released by San Diego on 6/8/2012...
Signed as a free agent by Boston on 8/23/2012 to a minor league deal...

Traded from Boston to Seattle on 2/27/2017 (Going to SEA: 3B L. Blakeman. Going to BOS: 2B D. Pedroia)...
Had first career hit (double) on 6/14/2018, off Marco Estrada (CHN)...
Hit first career homerun on 8/27/2018, off Boof Bonser (ARI)...
